name: Outage (Chillaxe Games)
description:
Go to submission page

Welcome to Outage

Outage is an atmospheric puzzle game in which your goal is to reconnect the power to a set of lights via a series of levels designed to offer a uniquely challenging experience!

Use the arrow keys and W,A,S,D to control the players and move them around the levels. But watch out: there is a third player who responds to both sets of controls. With 20 mind-bending levels to enjoy, Outage can provide (depending on how good you are at it) hours of fun!

Note that this game is intentionally designed to be challenging - that's why we created the solution document that you can access through the link below!

Outage saves your progress as you go - allowing you to return to the game whenever you feel up to the challenge.

Stuck on a level?

Fear not, all levels have been tried and tested! You can find all of the solutions here!

(This is not an exhaustive list of possible solutions. The vast majority of the levels can be solved in multiple different ways!)

Development Team

Thomas McCarthy   -   Programming, Level Design, Environment Art   [Link]

Patrick McCarthy   -   Tile Art, Level Design

Joseph Mohan   -   Original Soundtrack   [Link]

Created in 7 days for the Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam
